publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4517 Mr Frank McAveety: East End Youngsters Turning the Place Around—That the Parliament congratulates all the young people involved in the creation of Fuse, the east end youth café in Glasgow; recognises the hard work of east end youngsters in bringing former licensed premises on Shettleston Road back into use as a youth facility, providing space for music development, computer access and for public performance; commends the partnership with Shettleston Housing Association, Bringing East End Together (BEET) and Young East End Speaking (YES) and other supporters, and wishes Fuse a long future in providing a service shaped for and designed by young people themselves.

S3M-4517 Mr Frank McAveety: East End Youngsters Turning the Place Around—That the Parliament congratulates all the young people involved in the creation of Fuse, the east end youth café in Glasgow; recognises the hard work of east end youngsters in bringing former licensed premises on Shettleston Road back into use as a youth facility, providing space for music development, computer access and for public performance; commends the partnership with Shettleston Housing Association, Bringing East End Together (BEET) and Young East End Speaking (YES) and other supporters, and wishes Fuse a long future in providing a service shaped for and designed by young people themselves.
